title: Wout van Aert Commits to Unprecedented Career-Long Contract with Visma-Lease a Bike
content:
'This team is unique': Van Aert signs blockbuster deal as the peloton's 'super teams' scramble to secure the big talents.

Read the full article at Wout van Aert Commits to Unprecedented Career-Long Contract with Visma-Lease a Bike on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
